# Support

Getting started with EmailEngine

## Email support

The support email address for EmailEngine is <support@postalsys.com>.

Use this address if you have any issues running EmailEngine, you found a bug, or there is a billing issue.

## Resources

You can find information about using EmailEngine on this website (see the Using EmailEngine and Operating EmailEngine menu items at the top of the page).

There are also a lot of usage patterns and use cases explained on the EmailEngine's blog [here](https://docs.emailengine.app/).
